Package ca.dominicmayhew.Pipe

Class Worker<T>

java.lang.Object
ca.dominicmayhew.Pipe.Worker<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public abstract class Worker<T> extends Object implements Runnable
Abstract Superclass for `Creator` and `Receiver`. Provides some shared fields and methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • Worker

      public Worker​(int workerId, Pipe<T> pipe)
      Takes a Worker ID # and the Pipe that this Worker is attached to. Worker ID is provided by the subclass to allow for separate ID spaces for `Creator` and `Receiver` objects.
      Parameters:
      workerId - the ID # of the Worker.
      pipe - the Pipe this Worker is attached to.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public abstract void run()
      The Runnable interface to be submitted to an `ExecutorService`.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • getStamp

      protected String getStamp()
      Used to mark each record with a unique stamp from the `Creator` and the `Processor`.
      Returns:
      a unique String processing stamp representing the Worker and the number of items it has previously processed.

    • getId

      protected int getId()
      Returns the ID integer of this `Worker`.
      Returns:
      the ID integer of this `Worker`.

    • spin

      protected void spin()
      Causes the worker to spin (busy wait) for an interval as prescribed by `Params`.

    • printExceptionMessage

      protected void printExceptionMessage​(ProcessingException pe)
      Provides uniform exception logging.
      Parameters:
      pe - the `ProcessingException` thrown.
